doc.field: Series III: The James Buell Munn Scholarship Fund
Series III: The James Buell Munn Scholarship Fund

Correspondence: Includes correspondence regarding establishment and funding of the Scholarship Fund; 1965 list of alumni pledges and payments. Correspondents include Louis Baron, A.A. Beaumont, William E. Buckler, Miguel A. de Capriles, Jacob D. Goldstein, James M. Hester, Irving H. Jurow, Ruth C.H. Munn*
